games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. Miles Bridges and LaMelo Ball each scored 20 points, Kon Knueppel added 16 and Moussa Diabate 11 as the Hornets won consecutive games for the first time since January 3-5 against Chicago and Oklahoma City.
blurbs: 🆕 Will Riley (WSH) made his first start of the season. 23 min, 7 pts.
⬆️ Justin Champagnie (WSH) played 32 min (season avg: 19). 15 pts, 11 reb, 3 ast.
⬆️ Jamir Watkins (WSH) played 29 min (season avg: 15). 11 pts, 6 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: Jalen Brunson scored 31 points, OG Anunoby added 23 and the New York Knicks followed their most lopsided win in franchise history with a 112-109 victory over the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday. Embiid played a season-high 46 minutes in an overtime win over Houston on Thursday and followed with 28 points on 10-of-12 shooing in the first half Saturday.
ORLANDO, Fla. -- — Donovan Mitchell scored 27 of his 36 points in the second half and the Cleveland Cavaliers pulled away to a 119-105 win over the Orlando Magic on Saturday night.

Kevin Huerter made a 3-pointer just before the buzzer, lifting the Chicago Bulls past the Boston Celtics 114-111 before retiring Derrick Rose’s jersey number on Saturday night. Coby White scored 22 points and hit five of Chicago’s 21 3s, helping the Bulls win their fourth straight.
blurbs: 🆕 Amari Williams (BOS) made his first start of the season. 10 min, 2 pts.

games.summary: Luka Doncic had 33 points and 11 assists, and the Lakers erased a 15-point deficit in the final seven minutes of a 116-110 victory over the Mavericks on Saturday night in the star guard's second visit to Dallas since his shocking trade to Los Angeles almost a year ago.
blurbs: 📋 Caleb Martin (DAL) made just his 5th start this season. 17 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Bam Adebayo had 26 points and 15 rebounds to lead the Miami Heat to a 147-116 victory over the Utah Jazz on Saturday night. Jusuf Nurkic had 17 points, 12 assists and 10 rebounds to become the first player in Jazz history with three consecutive triple-doubles.
blurbs: ⬆️ Cody Williams (UTAH) played 30 min (season avg: 17). 5 pts, 1 reb, 1 ast.
📋 Kasparas Jakucionis (MIA) made just his 4th start this season. 12 pts, 5 reb.
